RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 1 870 Y Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Purse 6300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRIMEROINDIOAZOOM dueled, forced out, recovered, late kick. ELEGANT JESS dueled, blew turn, late surge. PRUITT HERRERA inherit lead, erratic late. NAPO inside turn, late kick. ROCKETS AFLEET mid pack, erratic late. NEXT PRINCESS mid pack, 4wturn, faded. DIZZY LIZZY drifted out on turn. GOSPEL GLORY off slow, no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Primeroindioazoom
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, forced out, recovered, late kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 6400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES IN 2023(RACES WHERE ENTERED FOR $2500 OR LESS NOT CONSIDERED). Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NEW YEARS LOVE was restless in the gate, vied for the early lead from the inside to the turn then fell back slightly while saving ground on the turn but made a rebid in the stretch and slipped through in deep stretch to prevail. RAGING LADY broke out at the start then was placed off the pace through the turn then ran down the leader but was out kicked by inside rival and proved second best. MILLI STARR sprinted to the lead and inched away on the turn then was challenged in the stretch but fought gamely to hold the show. AUNT IRENE was forwardly placed while racing four wide to the turn but fell back around the turn, moved out to four wide in upper stretch to improve position. LA ROSA DRIVE was forwardly placed while racing three wide but flattened out. DOZO broke out leaving the gate then stalked the pace from five wide on the backstretch, moved in to three wide around the turn and was outfinished in the stretch. HEY ROXY was never a threat. SWEET TATUM was out run.

ENTRY.NAME: New Years Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, vied inside, fell back turn, slipped thru, prevail

ENTRY.NAME: Aunt Irene
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, fell back turn, 4wupper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Milli Starr
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprint to lead, inch away turn, gamely, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Raging Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, off pace, ran down leader, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Tatum
ENTRY.OWNER: Rushton Stacey Eskew Stuart and Alfrey Vance

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Claiming Purse 6000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IMA HOT TOTTIE went to the front to set all the pace but floated out into the stretch, kept on and drew off. FLYING LADY pressed the early pace from the two path to mid way down the backstretch then fell back around the turn but made a rebid in the stretch and was along for the place. CORY LOVES RAIN chased the leaders down the backstretch then made a two wide bid at the five sixteenths pole but couldn't catch the leader and weakened in deep stretch. ATHENIAN PRINCESS prompted the pace from three wide to the half mile marker, saved ground around the turn and faded in the stretch. DANGERELLA trailed the field to mid turn but was not a factor. WEST'S ON FIRE was always back.

ENTRY.NAME: Ima Hot Tottie
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, float out upper, kept on, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Flying Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, fell back turn, rebid, along for place

ENTRY.NAME: Cory Loves Rain
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leaders, bid5/16, couldn't catch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Athenian Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt pace 3w, saved ground turn, faded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 4 7F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 5000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $2,500. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $3,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RANDOM AFFAIR had brief early foot then vied for the lead to the half mile marker, reclaimed the lead and inched away in upper stretch and just held on. TOMBI lacked room coming onto the main track and had to check, then trailed the field to the turn, saved ground around the turn, moved out to three wide at the three sixteenths pole to make a late run and just missed. MY PAL settled off the pace down the backstretch then made a rail bid on the turn then angled out to three wide at the quarter pole but was outfinished late. KICK IT stalked the pace from three or four wide down the backstretch then was taken back around the turn and passed tiring rival. MASTERPIECE DAY was roused to the lead to the half mile marker then vied for the lead to the quarter pole and tired. RANCHER stumbled shortly after the start and almost unseated the rider but rider lost irons, then rushed up to contention but faltered and galloped in.

ENTRY.NAME: Tombi
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked room, checked, trailed, inside turn, late run, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Random Affair
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief foot, vied to 1/2, led, held on

ENTRY.NAME: Rancher
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled, almost unseated rider, lost irons

ENTRY.NAME: My Pal
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, rail bid turn, 3w1/4, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Kick It
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, taken back, passed tiring rivals,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 6800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BREDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; , 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KNIGHTED rushed to contention and kept on to vie for the lead at the half mile marker, match strides to the top of the stretch, drove past the leader at the eighth pole and was kept to task. FRISCO KID saved ground to the turn then angled out to two to four wide around the turn, kept moving out to five wide into upper stretch and rallied but was too late. PRINCE OTTO hustled to the lead, engaged at the half mile marker and dueled to early stretch and gave way grudgingly. KEENEYE GEORGE prompted the early pace to the half mile marker then settled off the pace while saving ground around the turn and faltered. AUDACE was last away but moved up from between horses at the five furlong marker and kept on from three wide through the turn and finished evenly. OH SNAP remained back. HONKY TONK MUSIC pressed the pace from the two path to the turn then retreated.

ENTRY.NAME: Frisco Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, 2-4w turn, 5wupper, rallied, too late

ENTRY.NAME: Keeneye George
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt pace, off pace, saved ground turn, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Honky Tonk Music
ENTRY.OWNER: Di Filippo Jo Ann and Tate Mary

ENTRY.NAME: Prince Otto
ENTRY.COMMENT: led, duel turn, gave way grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Knighted
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to contention, vied 1/2, duel turn, kept to task

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 6 5F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 5000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF A RACE IN 2023 OR NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $2,500. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $3,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OMACHE KID raced near the back to the turn then moved up from between horses at the quarter pole, tipped out to five wide in upper stretch to make a rally and be up in the final jumps. RHODIUM RUNNER sprinted to the lead and co-led from the two path to the quarter pole then inched away in the stretch drive but was nailed in the final jumps. LIL LATIGO was off the pace in the second flight on the inside to the three furlong marker then moved out to four wide in tupper stretch and made a late run to be a game third. EXPECT ROYAL rushed up to co-lead from the inside to the top of the stretch and gave way grudgingly. CHERUBIM was off the pace in the second flight from the two path to the turn then moved up from three wide at the three furlong marker and engaged the leader at the quarter pole but tired. FERRARI ROAD was off the pace in the second flight from three wide to mid turn and weakened. RI' PIN SNAP has an awkward start and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Omache Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, between 1/4, 5wupper, rallied, up final jumps

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 6800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF A RACE IN 2023 OR NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GREY ROGUE sprinted to the front to share clear command from the inside to the five sixteenths pole then edged away, drifted out in mid stretch while tiring but just lasted. TASHKENT raced in the middle of the pack on the inside down the backstretch then went two wide around the final turn, tipping out to four wide in upper stretch to make a rally and just missed. WILLTOBELUCKY raced in the middle of the pace from the two path down the backstretch then saved ground around the final turn and was gaining on the leader but weakened. THE GREATEST EAGLE was unhurried through the final turn and passed tiring rivals. JU JU GUY chased the leaders down the backstretch then gained ground around the turn but tired in deep stretch. GIMME SPACE was allowed to settle around the first turn then moved up from two wide down the backstretch, saved ground around the final turn but failed to menace. CLEARLY MAD roused to the front to share a clear command from the two path to the five sixteenths pole and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Tashkent
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, 2wturn, 4wupper, late rally, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Willtobelucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, saved ground turn, gaining late, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Grey Rogue
ENTRY.COMMENT: shared command, edged away, drifted out, tired, just lasted,

ENTRY.NAME: Gimme Space
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, move up 2w, saved ground turn, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Clearly Mad
ENTRY.OWNER: Rushton Stacey Eskew Stuart and Alfrey Vance

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Pen Pal S. ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 8 350 Y Dirt CR: 84. Stakes Purse 17800. PURSE $17.800. 3 year olds and older. Weight 124lbs. Runs: Sunday August 13. $50 to nominate, $350 to enter. Nominations close Friday August 4.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KALI K steady drive. PAINTED RARE bobbled start, late kick. JESS NO SECRETS hard fought. JESS UN SIES MAS popped, out kicked. FOOLS CARTEL drifted out, not involved. MR DASH FIRE hesitated start. A STEWARDS INQUIRY WAS POSTED INTO THE START OF THE RACE, AFTER A REVIEW THEY DETERMINED THAT MR DASH FIRE WAS THE CAUSE OF HIS OWN ISSUES AND NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CTBA Laddie S. ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 65. Stakes Purse 18188. PURSE $18,188. Two year old Colorado Bred colts and geldings. Weight 120 lbs. Nominations contact CTBA.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FERRARI RED hustled to the lead to set all the pace, was headed a the five sixteenths pole and match strides with EZ FITZ to the quarter pole then dug in and drew off to prove best. EZ FITZ was away alertly, prompted the pace from three wide to the three furlong marker then moved to engage the leader at the five sixteenths pole and matched strides to the quarter pole but floated out entering the stretch and was tiring but held on for the place. PALACE PATCH was off a step slow and trailed the field to the seven sixteenths pole then slipped up the rail to press the pace at the three furlong marker but fell back around the turn, made a rebid in the stretch to just miss the place. CHASING THE KING was just off the pace in the two path to the half mile marker then fell back and chased the leaders home. A JOCKEY OBJECTION WAS POSTED, THE JOCKEY OF PALACE PATCH CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST THE JOCKEY OF FERRARI RED FOR ALLEGED INTERFERNCE AT THE THREE FURLONG MARKER, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW THE CLAIM OF FOUL WAS DISALLOWED AND NO ACTION WAD TAKEN. THIS WAS A NON WAGERING EVENT, HORSES RAN FOR PURSE MONEY ONLY.

ENTRY.NAME: Palace Patch
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, trailed, pressed pace, fell back, rebid, miss 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Ferrari Red
ENTRY.OWNER: Hickey Wendy and Martinez Jr O A
ENTRY.COMMENT: led, set pace, headed 5/16, dug in, drew off, best

ENTRY.NAME: Ez Fitz
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, prompt pace, engaged 5/16, float out 1/4, held 2nd
